fields.description:
Hi :),

It could be usefull to allow us to desactivate zoomBouncing on scrollView

https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/#DOCUMENTATION/UIKit/Reference/UIScrollView_Class/Reference/UIScrollView.html

Thank you
fields.summary: iOS: zoomBouncing not implemented on scrollView
